title: Will a BSc in aviation help me to become an air traffic controller? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depending on the country, probably not as much as or would think. I can only speak to the current process in the US, any bachelors will qualify you to take the entrance test (bio data questionnaire) But so would 3 years of full time work experience or combo of university and work that equals 3 years. If you go thru a CTI program either 2 or 4 year then you get it bypass the first test (BQ) hope that helps
